What's New in DockFlow 1.41

  • Enhanced Export and Import System
    • Export without folders - Now the default method, perfect for sharing presets between different machines
    • Selective preset management - Choose exactly which presets to export and import with full control
    • Custom labeling system - Edit labels before exporting with separate private and public labels for better organization and sharing
    • Smart app detection - Get notified when imported apps don't exist on your Mac, with direct download links provided for many apps
    • Easy wizard UI - Streamlined, user-friendly interface guides you through both export and import processes
  • Modern Action Settings UI
    • Completely redesigned Action settings interface with a modern, intuitive design
    • Action icons now display directly in the edit preset screen next to each app that has an action configured
    • Enhanced usability and visual clarity for managing app-specific actions
  • UI/UX Improvements
    • Fixed various UI/UX bugs in light mode for better consistency
    • Multiple small fixes for improved overall look and behavior
    • Enhanced visual polish across the entire application

Thank You!

These improvements make sharing and managing your DockFlow presets easier than ever. We appreciate your continued feedback and support!
